page.title: 11SHOPPING COSTS, KINGSTON
page.content: Shopping in Kingston is very easy and very varied. Every day the milkman comes to your house and delivers the { {milk}in glass bottles costing 23p a pint. Also daily, the newspaper boy comes delivering your {newspaper} costing 18p to 25p. On{letters}a 1st class stamp costs 17p, a 2nd class stamp costs 13p. {Holidays}_ you can book a holiday for 2 weeks in Spain, it's about Â£240 a person in a hotel with all your food. {Houses}- you can get a 3 bedroomed detached house in Latchmere Road for about Â£80,000. { {Clothing}- a pair of jeans is about Â£8.50. {Shoes}- Childrens shoes are about Â£15.00 for a good pair.
